turkish_example_sentence: Sen pazardan taze yeşil sebzeleri almışsan, lezzetli yemek pişirebilirdin.
english_example_sentence: If you had taken the fresh green vegetables from the market, you could have cooked a delicious meal.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты взял свежие зеленые овощи с рынка, ты мог бы приготовить вкусное блюдо.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen pazardan taze yeşil sebzeleri ______, lezzetli yemek pişirebilirdin.
